name: Crazy Er-Bert
overview: A cubic-domain game in which you must change the colour of the grid and avoid the gorilla, balls and snake. Starring : Crazy Er*Bert Supporting cast : Boris the Gorilla, Coily the Snake Featuring : Cascading balls, deadly discs, balmy bananas, rotating rota-hats Great fun in this arcade-style classic! Part of "Triple Decker 7" game pack / a.k.a. "Pac Manic" on "Triple Decker 7" cover / a.k.a. "Muncher" and "Classic Arcadia Collection"
